feed.title: Relay Node Demo - maintenance
feed.subtitle: Industrial Sci-Fi ASCII Cinema Network - Demo Site

entry.title: Network Status Update
entry.content:
Scheduled maintenance window completed. All systems nominal.

Recent Improvements

Bandwidth Optimization

We've implemented new compression algorithms that reduce bandwidth usage by approximately 40% while maintaining visual fidelity. This is particularly beneficial for users on limited connections.

New Relay Nodes

Two new relay nodes have been deployed:

NodeLocationStatus
DeltaSA-EastOnline
EpsilonAF-SouthTesting

Archive Expansion

The central archive now contains over 10,000 ASCII cinema recordings, including:

  • Classic film conversions
  • Original network productions
  • Live stream recordings
  • Interactive experiences

Upcoming Maintenance

The next scheduled maintenance window will occur on the first Sunday of next month, 0200-0400 UTC. Expect intermittent connectivity during this period.

Stay connected.
